::Kluster::

Kluster walks into the bridge of the Cybertronian Fire, recieving 
Deemos' transmission. He frowns, activating his comm-link.

"Why do you need Gangon?" he asked, wondering why Deemos what need
the 
prisoner for.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> The Chosen Ones get a bit tired of waiting.
> 
> "Kluster, I repeat again, can we have prisoner Gangon?" Deemos
asks. 
Serge is starting to feel better at the thought of battle. Tesifier 
would kill KitKat and her foolish and insultive boyfriend and avenge 
his sister and Justice. Rizopas hoped nobody would be afraid of him. 
Stronghold and Blender just wanted to earn their pay. Serge would 
destroy whatever he could. Doom Ice would lay out the heavy artillery 
and make the Preds pay. Plintissa and Gangon (Maybe) would be forced 
to fight against their will. Diskus would probably get slagged again. 
And Deemos will be sure to get in his chea
